title: BALL Refer & Earn Programme
subtitle: Turn your network into income; Earn up to ₦1 million in cash and gifts for every BALLer you bring on board.

steps.title: Create (or Log In to) Your Account
steps.description: Open a free BALL account in seconds. Inside your dashboard you'll see a dedicated “Refer & Earn” section with your unique referral link and code.

steps.title: Share Your Referral Link
steps.description: Send that link to friends, family, colleagues or anyone dreaming of a quality home with flexible payment plans.

note.text: Save your referral link and feel free to share it with friends on all social media platforms to maximize your earnings.

steps.title: They Pick a Home & Make Their First Payment
steps.description: Your referral signs up through your link, chooses their dream property and completes the very first payment.

note.text: You can keep track of your earnings and referrals anytime on your BALL Refer & Earn page.

steps.title: Cash-In Immediately
steps.description: As soon as their first payment hits, you qualify for a referral bonus worth up to ₦1,000,000 in cash plus gifts. No need to wait until the house is fully paid off.

note.text: Your referral rewards (cash and gifts) will be received within 3 days. We'll send you an email to confirm your details and preferred payment account before processing your reward.

steps.title: Track & Repeat
steps.description: Monitor every referral and payout in real-time from your dashboard, then keep sharing your link to multiply your earnings.

note.text: There is no limit to how many BALLers you can refer.
